CatDescriptText: Curt Roberts (1929-1969) played for the Kansas City Monarch before his career with the Pirates from 1954 to 1956.  He was the first African American player with the Pittsburgh Pirates.
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Pirates baseball players Curtis "Curt" Roberts and Bob Skinner seated in the dugout at Forbes Field
CatSubject_tab: Pirates (Baseball team : Pittsburgh, Pa.)Forbes Field (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
